altTitles.zh: 拒绝暴君专宠：凶猛王妃
拒绝暴君专宠:凶猛王妃
凶猛王妃：拒绝暴君专宠

altTitles.zh-hk: 拒絕暴君專寵：兇猛王妃

altTitles.zh-ro: Jùjué Bàojūn Zhuān Chǒng: Xiōngměng Wángfēi
Jujue Baojun Zhuan Chong: Xiongmeng Wangfei

altTitles.en: Refuse Spoiling From the Despot: Hot Princess
Refused to Be the Tyrant's Special Pet: Fierce Wang Hao
Refusing the Tyrant’s Favor: The Fierce Princess

altTitles.vi: Vương Phi Hung Mãnh: Từ Chối Bạo Quân Chuyên Sủng

description.en:
Although she was an intelligent agent, her first mission had failed when she traveled back in time, falling right into a tyrant's bed and hurting the man in the process. As she was under influence, she thought the tyrant was an escort, even going as far as to leave a tip after doing the deed. The woman was simply cruel. She messed with the tyrant, spent money foolishly, and used her skills and strength to bully the weak!

---
**Original Manhua:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/552839), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24650), [iQiyi Manhua](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzm0iued.html), [Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1240/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/211648/), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/1824/)

**Official English Translations:** [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc1238), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/8)
description.es:
Ella es una agente especial que viajó en el tiempo. Accidentalmente cayó en la cama del emperador, a pesar de ser drogada pudo escapar. Afuera lo confundió con un Gigoló, tuvo sexo con él e incluso le dejó propina. Esta es la historia de un romance a través del tiempo.

---
**Original Manhua:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/552839), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24650), [iQiyi Manhua](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzm0iued.html), [Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1240/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/211648/), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/1824/)

**Official English Translations:** [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc1238), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/8)
description.ru:
Новый агент, выполняя первое задание, попала в другое измерение. Петля времени отправила ее в спальню к принцу-тирану. Она убежала от него, сломав по дороге крышу. Поддалась отношениям на одну ночь и сразу же исчезла. Однако успела перейти черту. Что теперь ее ждет в будущем? Бои, мучения, и невероятно привлекательный наследник королевских кровей.

---
**Original Manhua:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/552839), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24650), [iQiyi Manhua](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzm0iued.html), [Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1240/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/211648/), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/1824/)

**Official English Translations:** [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc1238), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/8)
description.zh:
她是天才特工，第一次任务却惨遭失败穿越掉落龙床，打断暴君的动作片。身中迷药的她，却把暴君当做了鸭，吃干抹净就走，还留下小费？这个女人欺人太甚！然而暴君是用来虐的，钱是随便花的，武功是欺负弱小的，美貌嘛嘿嘿自然是拿来挑逗帅哥的……

---
**Original Manhua:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/552839), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24650), [iQiyi Manhua](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzm0iued.html), [Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1240/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/211648/), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/1824/)

**Official English Translations:** [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc1238), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/8)
